days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Act of Contrition  Lord Jesus Christ, I am heartily sorry for my sins. Grant me, therefore, pardon of my sins and the grace I ask of You through the merits of the sorrows of Your loving Mother and the virtues of Your martyr, Saint Expeditus.

Daily Prayer

O Glorious Martyr, St Expeditus, through the lively faith which was granted you by God, I ask you to awaken the same faith in my heart, that I may also believe wholeheartedly that there is God, but most particularly that I may be saved from sinning against Him.

Concluding Prayer

O Saint Expeditus, my protector, in you I place my hope that my petitions may be granted if they are for my own good.  Please ask Our Lord, through the intercession of the Blessed Virgin, for the forgiveness of my sins, and the grace to change my life, particularly the grace of (mention request here…) and I promise to follow your example and propagate this devotion to you.  (Now pray three Our Fathers in honor of the Most Holy Trinity.)
